title: Crown Esports LF Mid (Diamond+)

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Crown Esports (@CrownEsportsAU). Oceanic Esports Organisation founded in 2018. Specialising in League of Legends and Overwatch. Business enquiries: crownesportsau@gmail.com. Australia

body:
Crown Esports are currently looking for a new mid laner for the main roster! If you are interested in sharpening your skills in a competitive environment, please message us on Twitter or add Imperiusˆ in the League of Legends Client.
Requirements: Diamond+ Solo Queue, working mic, available evenings and weekends

Crown Esports Achievements
- Three 1st Place Finishes in Online Tournaments (Total Mayhem Gaming, Summoner's Society)
- Four 2nd Place Finishes 
- Six 3rd Place Finishes

Currently tied 1st Place in Kairutox's Tesla League Division I.
